      Method parameters in physics with type arguments of type Collider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RaycastHit Physics.raycast(Ray ray, int layer, java.util.ArrayList<Collider> ignore)
      Raycast method with ability to ignore certain objects
      Info: layer | RAYCAST_ALL in order to ignore the isBlocking value in collider
